title: Pier Luigi Bersani - Wikipedia
snippet: Pier Luigi Bersani (Italian pronunciation: [ˈpjɛr luˈiːdʒi berˈsaːni]; born 29 September 1951) is an Italian politician and was Secretary of the Democratic Party (PD), Italy's leading centre-left party, from 2009 to 2013. title: Democratic Centre (Italy)
snippet: Centro Democratico (CD) is a centrist political party in Italy, founded on 28 December 2012 by Bruno Tabacci and dissidents from prior centrist formations seeking to bolster the centre-left alliance led by Pier Luigi Bersani.

title: Pier Luigi Bersani | Italian politician | Britannica
snippet: Other articles where Pier Luigi Bersani is discussed: Italy: Scandal and the struggling economy: Pier Luigi Bersani, the leader of the center-left Democratic Party (Partito Democratico; PD), commanded a majority in the lower house of parliament.

title: Pier Luigi Bersani facts for kids
snippet: Pier Luigi Bersani (born 29 September 1951) is an Italian politician. He was the leader, or Secretary, of the Democratic Party (PD). This was Italy's main centre-left political group from 2009 to 2013.
